item.description: 1st Annual Boston Couples Group New Year's Eve Bash December 31st,2011 7:30pm Help us kick of 2012 with a bang. Join us for a night of music,dancing, food, and fun. We will have areas for people to play poker/other games, play WII, and of course dance the night away. Feel free to bring any other forms of entertainment as well. At midnight we will watch the ball drop and we’ll raise our glasses and cheer as we toast to a wonderful New Year! We will be putting out a spread of tapas and goodies to feast, if you wish to bring something, please bring a dessert or drinks. We live in Hull, right by Nantasket Beach. We will send out the address closer to those who RSVP 'YES', closer to the date. Since we will be putting a limit on amount of people that can attend due to space and buying food, please make sure that you make your final decision by 12-27. We look forward to seeing everyone!
item.name: 1st Annual Boston Couples New Years Eve Party!!
